name: Bus Driver 3D Army Simulator
description:
Now play Bus Driver 3D and become a master in Simulator Games.Get set for another round of an exciting bus driving simulation game, this time with more fun and action packed gameplay. The passengers are waiting, SO HURRY UP! Be on time and park at the bus stop, pick up the passengers and drop them off at the destination.
Bus Driver 3D is the latest simulation game that will offer you the chance to become a real Bus Driver! Realistic maps, incredible vehicles, wonderful interiors will make you feel like driving a real bus!

Bus Driver 3D features
- Cool jumbo city bus
- Realistic city environments
- built-in accelerometer
- Different camera angles that give you more control
- Amazing 3D graphics
Try out this new Bus Driver 3D and enhance your parking skills!

This game provides you with unlimited entertainments and has
* Beautiful 3D graphics
* Extreme precision driving simulator
* Highly entertaining gameplay
* Challenging and outstanding 3D outdoor environment with stunning graphics
* Great sounds

Download it and install it on your smart phone and you really love it.
